sentences.en: a veteran of countless political campaigns
sentences.cn: 经历过无数次政治运动的一名老将

sentences.en: He is a versatile, veteran and superb technician.
sentences.cn: 他是个技术全面、经验丰富、技巧娴熟的运动能手

sentences.en: He is a veteran in playing ping - pong.
He is a veteran of the last revolution in medical technology, gene therapy, which, after some hyped expectations in the 1990s, fell into disfavor after some unsuccessful trials.
sentences.cn: 他是基因治疗这项最新医学技术的老手，经过了1990年代的兴奋期和之后几次失败的实验后，基因治疗技术已经失宠了。

sentences.en: He is a veteran parliamentarian whose views enjoy widespread respect.
sentences.cn: 他是个资深议员，其观点受到广泛尊重。

sentences.en: He was a Vietnam veteran with a haunted mien.
sentences.cn: 他是个越战老兵,举止总有些惶然.

sentences.en: He's the seasoned veteran, who has taken the children to the museum many times.
sentences.cn: 他多次带着孩子参观博物馆, 经验十分丰富.

sentences.en: His grandfather is a veteran of the Second World War.
sentences.cn: 他的祖父是一位参加过二战的老战士.

sentences.en: It is understood that the veteran reporter had a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 据悉，那位资深记者心脏病发作。

sentences.en: My grandfather is a veteran of the Second World War.
sentences.cn: 我祖父是二战时的老兵.

sentences.en: The baseball veteran loved to coach young players.
sentences.cn: 这位棒球老手喜欢指导年轻选手.

sentences.en: The old veteran had a martial bearing.
sentences.cn: 那老兵具有威武的仪表.

sentences.en: the veteran British actor, Sir Richard Attenborough
sentences.cn: 英国资深演员理查德∙阿滕伯勒爵士

sentences.en: The veteran soldier has fought many memorable battles.
sentences.cn: 这个老兵参加过许多难忘的战斗.

sentences.en: The veteran worker ranks high in public love and esteem.
sentences.cn: 那位老工人深受大伙的爱戴.

sentences.en: This veteran cadre still remains his philosophy of hard work and plain - living.
sentences.cn: 这位老干部仍然保持着艰苦朴素的作风.

sentences.en: We often asked the veteran workers for advice.
sentences.cn: 我们常常向老工人求教.

trans.tran_cn: 经验丰富的人，老兵，退伍军人
trans.tran_en: someone who has been a soldier, sailor etc in a war
